name: 黃希敏
objective: 引導學生瞭解如何根據不同對象、不同場合、不同時間、不同情境，貼切地使用英語，也概括介紹分析語言溝通所需的概念與工具。
schedule:
01  Introduction
02  Yule 1: Definitions and background
03  Yule 2: Deixis and distance
04  Yule 3: Reference and inference
05  Yule 4: Presupposition and entailment
06  Yule 5: Cooperation and implication
07  Yule 6: Speech acts and events
08  Yule 7: Politeness and interaction
09  Yule 8: Conversation and preference structure
10  Yule 9: Discourse and culture + Peccei 1: What is Pragmatics
11  Presentation: You Think I am Stupid? Face Needs in Intercultural Conflicts.
Journal of Intercultural Communication, 2011.
12  Presentation: Facework in Intercultural E-mail Communication in the Academic Environment 
13  Presentation: Reader Ch 3. Hofstede’s value dimensions and Hall’s high context/low context + Ch 4. Interpersonal politeness and power
14 Presentation:  Reader Ch 7. Managing rapport in talk: Using rapport sensitive incidents to explore the motivational concerns underlying the management of relations + Ch 16. Intercultural or not? Beyond celebration of cultural differences in miscommunication analysis
15  Presentation:  Reader Ch 11. The pragmatic functions of the recitation of Qur’anic verses by Muslims in their oral genre: The case of Insha’ allah, ‘God’s willing’ + Ch 12. The silent Finn revisited
16  Presentation: Reader Ch 17. The interactive constitution of interculturality: How to be a Japanese with words + Ch 19. Intercultural communication at work in Australia: Complaints and apologies in turns
17 Presentation: Intercultres, Encyclopedic Knowledge, and Cultural Models
18 Review

Textbook 1  Yule: Pragmatics. Oxford
Textbook 2  Peccei: Pragmatics. Routledge

Textbook 3 Sharifian and Jamarani. eds. (2013). Language and Intercultural Communication in the New Era. Routledge.
 
Textbook 4 Zhu Hua, ed. (2011). The Language and Intercultural Communication Reader. Routledge.
